about_the_game:
This set allows you to change the Xipha cover to the 40th Anniversary version.

40th Anniversary: Solid
40th Anniversary: Gorgeous

*Open [DLC] under the [Item] page in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*After unlocking items, apply them via [Modify Orbment] in the Orbment Workshop menu.
*Full The Legend of Heroes: Kuro no Kiseki game (sold separately) required to access this content. Please update and install the most recent patch if necessary.
detailed_description:
About This Additional Content

This content is part of the early bird purchase bonus.
Early Bird Purchase Bonus Period: until August 17, 2022 23:59 (PDT).


About the Game

This set allows you to change the Xipha cover to the 40th Anniversary version.

40th Anniversary: Solid
40th Anniversary: Gorgeous

*Open [DLC] under the [Item] page in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*After unlocking items, apply them via [Modify Orbment] in the Orbment Workshop menu.
*Full The Legend of Heroes: Kuro no Kiseki game (sold separately) required to access this content. Please update and install the most recent patch if necessary.
